title: Priyanka Chopra Wears Yet Another Oversize Blazer to the U.S. Open
text:
It's blazer season, people. And nobody knows better than Priyanka Chopra Jonas, who attended day nine of the U.S. Open to watch Serena Williams capture her 100th U.S. Open win in our ideal fall getup.

View photos

Worn over a floral skirt and white silk-and-lace cami, Chopra's blazer is the very on-trend gray plaid version we've been eyeing for a few weeks.

She also wore an oversize blazer last week to husband Nick Jonas's Villa One tequila launch party in NYC, and again in June 2018.

Chopra was the world's best cheerleader as she watched Williams play. She took her mom, Madhu Chopra, with her to the match for a mom-and-daughter date night.

View photos

The blazer, floral skirt, cami and silver chain bag are all by Paco Rabanne. The blazer retails for $1,060, but is on sale right now for $789 (Paycheck? What paycheck?!).

And then she took a phone call, possibly from hubby Nick to tell her how cute she looked on TV.

View photos

"Blazer game strong, hunny." - Nick Jonas, probably.

RELATED: Serena Williams’s Net Worth Is Enormous (& Her Tennis Earnings Are Only a Portion of It)
